attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Theresa May after visiting USA's president Donald Trump
attributes.additional_details: PM May is still going ahead with this visit only thinking about a possible 'trade deal' and not thinking about basic human rights, racism and sexism.
attributes.background: After visiting the president elect - Trump, PM Theresa May extended a state visit invitation. After many protests all over the UK (after the executive order in regards to banning refugees indefinitely and ban on 7 Muslim countries) Theresa May did not listen to the British public.
